text:
@DrOz No, you soooooooooo spoke quite loudly and blatantly, buddy

So, given that the generalizable population prone to #COVID19 is near 100%, what mortality N-size do you believe should be sampled to sufficiently detect the drastically large effects of your white privileged ignorance?
